name: ATX: Get to the Fest
description:
Capstone Project for Ada Developers Academy C11. Made by Kimberly Fasbender using Unity & C#.

Help ATX the Armadillo get to the music festival by traveling through Austin, TX while collecting music notes and throwing back a few cold ones!

For more information/instructions please visit my GitHub page at: https://github.com/Kimberly-Fasbender/ATX
